```{r}
library(dslabs)
data("na_example")
# NA data frame
na_example
# Total number of NAs
sum(is.na(na_example))
# New data frame where NAs replaced with 0.
no_nas <- ifelse(is.na(na_example), 0, na_example)
no_nas
# Total number of NAs in our new data frame.
sum(is.na(no_nas))
```
